t:
We had a new technological breakthrough when they launched cloud backup for our memory.
No more memory loss, they said, and it's free. Everybody signed up for it.




But a year later, you had to upgrade to Pro or have ads embedded in your memory.
c:
Thinking of another child? Here's an ad for condoms.



#backup #memory #cloud #ads #tricked #trapped #privacymatters #scifishortstory
